mapper.sql: id, purchase_no, approve_flag, generate_time, purchaser_id, purchaser_name, purchase_time, total_money, send_flag, cleared, approve_result

select
distinct
from pension_purchase_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pension_purchase_record (id, purchase_no, approve_flag, generate_time, purchaser_id, purchaser_name, purchase_time, total_money, send_flag, cleared, approve_result) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{generateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purchaserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchaserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approveResult,jdbcType=INTEGER})
